item.title: AFK Command / Vote4
item.dc:creator: @codeman9909 codeman9909
item.description:
@codeman9909 wrote:

Okay I fixed everything but not I need to know one thing.

  1. Do you know a good website hoster where I can add Vote4Cash/Items

  2. How do I make an afk command where when you are afk you can’t move.
    if (playerCommand.startsWith(“afk”) && !c.sit) {
    if(c.inWild()) {
    c.sendMessage(“Er, it’s not to smart to go AFK in the Wilderness…”);
    return;
    }
    c.sit = true;
    c.startAnimation(4117);
    c.forcedText = “Im afk!”;
    c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
    c.updateRequired = true;
    c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
    }

Read full topic
